channel.title: Tops on MarWinsWorld
channel.description: Recent content in Tops on MarWinsWorld

item.description: Like as many husbands, fathers, and curious human beings, I do have lots of interests outside my professional life. For years I’m improving my home automation environment continuously, integrating more and more entities, sensors, actors, etc. Sometimes I’m driving my family nuts with it, but it improved over time. I’m a hobby backyard astronomer, scuba diver, gardener, and very shortly a dog owner as well, next to rabbits and birds.
